definition: to congregate/to assemble/to mass/to gather together/to amass/to polymerize

first of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/(used for an unspecified person or thing)/first (in a list, as a party to a contract etc)/letter "A" or roman "I" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/armor plating/shell or carapace/(of the fingers or toes) nail/bladed leather or metal armor (old)/ranking system used in the Imperial examinations (old)/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)/ancient Chinese compass point: 75°

sentences.english: The polyformaldehyde production includes two processes: homopolymerization and co-polymerization.
sentences.chinese: 聚甲醛有均聚和共聚兩種生產方法。

sentences.english: The Paper introduces the brief developing history of Hoechst Celanese Corp. and its standard & specialty grades of acetal copolymer.
sentences.chinese: 公司發展簡史和共聚甲醛的標準品級以及特殊品級。

sentences.english: Routinely processed 4% formamint-fixed, paraffin-embedded blocks were archived.
sentences.chinese: 所有標本用4%多聚甲醛固定，常規石蠟包埋後存檔。

sentences.english: The frame mount is made of delrin.
sentences.chinese: 框架安裝是聚甲醛樹脂製成。

sentences.english: This part is fabricated from a small piece of delrin as specified below.
sentences.chinese: 這部分是從下面製作一塊小聚甲醛作爲指定。

sentences.english: This project mainly makes use of methanol to produce polyoxymethylene ( POM ) .
sentences.chinese: 本項目主要以甲醇爲原料生產聚甲醛。

sentences.english: The invention greatly improves the industrialized performance of polyformaldehyde.
sentences.chinese: 本發明大大提升了聚甲醛工業性能。

sentences.english: MOCA is prepared with o-chloroaniline and paraformaldehyde as materials.
sentences.chinese: 以鄰氯苯胺和多聚甲醛爲反應原料製備MOCA。
